I am currently working on the project of sensor network where I would
lik=
e to use neural network as forcast system in each sensor node.

I would lik=
e to compare my result with that of rtNEAT (if rtNEAT can
meet our requirem=
ent in sensor system).

To my best knowledge, rtNEAT can do real time proce=
ssing if the
computational power is strong enough (because of the populatio=
n is
generally large, e.g. 100 --- even though it is not a large population=

in terms of statistics). But since sensor node will only possess basic
pro=
cessing ability, I am not sure if rtNEAT can be applied in such
scenario or=
 not .. AND, just to want to make it clear: we are looking
for the solution=
 system which can do training online and which will be
deployed inside one =
sensor node (so that each sensor will have
embedded rtNEAT model, e.g.).

(=
in my case, I will deploy one neural network system with roughly 100
number=
 of sypnaptic connections inside the sensor node, in order to
keep the comp=
utation cost --- for training --- low)

Can any one help me through ?

Than=
ks alot

Joe
